sections.heading: Duties:
Records
sections.text:
and reports of operators; compilation and publication of reported information

by Administrator; notification to Administrator of opening or closing of mine

sections.heading: Annual
sections.text: inspection and investigation of mines by Administrator or designee.

sections.text:
of Administrator to inspect mines; operator to render assistance; advance

notice of inspection prohibited; participation by representative of workers.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text:
by Administrator when inspection reveals dangerous conditions or violations;

notice or order prima facie evidence of culpable negligence of operator.

sections.heading: Notices
sections.text:
and orders: Contents; distribution of copies; notification to Mine Safety and

Health Administration of the United States Department of Labor required under

certain circumstances.

sections.text: may request inspection of mine; conditions.

sections.text:
to notify Attorney General on failure or refusal of operator to comply with

sections.text:
accidents: Notice to Administrator; duties of operator and other persons;

investigation of cause.

sections.text: of regulations, standards, notices and orders to be posted by operator.

sections.text: and inspection of information, reports, notices, orders and findings.
